name: Channabasava R Madari
title: Read the review before buying.
text: Maybe it has good offer or provides free creatine, but DON'T BUY IT.Packaging and branding over the box is so cheap. The label is rolled over the box like it's done with the hand.It looks nothing like the one in image.That powder inside smells great, tastes great but it's all milk powder enhanced. That protein content is really low.I got this for Rs.1000 with a free creatine. How can anyone produce 1kg of whey protein for just 700.The lab report given by some youtubers such as 20kgdown, Allaboutnutrition found this had only 12g protein scoop i.e., half of what has been claimed. And 18g/scoop in some batches. Many other youtubers found the same but they later removed their video from YouTube when the company paid them to do so.So most of the reviews on youtube are paid by the company.Other options available in same price range such are MB Fuel one or SINEW whey conc. 79I just want other beginners like me to not get cheated and be able to choose the right product for their price. Good luck.

title: Bigmuscles claiming 71% and giving 30-40% protein in relaity
text:
The media could not be loaded.
                
¬†Unfortunately I‚Äôve been using bigmuscle product since last 2-3 months because I ordered a 2kg and 1kg pack together and it was the biggest mistake of my life. Upon mixing the powder with water it forms a lot of froth and almost 3/4th of the powder turns into the froth and then you have to wait for at least 30 mins for froth to settle down. And I was not getting any visible result using this product so i did some research and found that the labdoor has revoked their certification. So i got curious and saw some videos on YouTube where most of the people did the lab test of the protein and found that this powder only provides 30-40%(10-14g per serving of 35gm) of protein on dry basis whereas it claims almost 71% protein on there label. Maybe this is the reason labdoor has revoked there certification. I hope my review helps you to decide whether to buy this product or not.

name: Yogesh
title: This product is a scam
text: I am into serious bodybuilding and only buy certified supplements from offline stores. After a lot of thinking I decided to buy products online especially with the deadly pandemic on the loose. It's easier buying online but what if you don't get genuine products? I saw that this protein was Bestseller and recently certified by Labdoor which is a recognised certification organization. So I bought a 1 kg pack in Belgian chocolate flavor to try out and I‚Äôm so disappointed with the product. According to the brand‚Äôs claim after a lot of research and reading reviews, the protein they are offering per scoop is not that what is available. This is fake completely. The real protein content is very low than the claim by the brand. It provides only 13 g protein in 35 g serving which is not useful for me at all. How can Labdoor certify such a product? There are much better options in the market than to consume a subpar whey protein. Highly disappointed with the product. Am a bit confused now, is it a fake or a real product?

name: Ritwik
title: Bigmuscles cheating people left and right (Only 14gms protein per serving)
text: Please avoid at all cost. I made the mistake of going for this because of the product being number one on Amazon and also because the company claimed 25gms of protein per serving. Little did I know that such big companies lie so blatantly with their nutritional facts (and claim FDA approval). Any lab test proof you'd find for this brand would show you how big muscles is cheating customers by providing barely 14gms protein per serving as compared to the claimed 25gms. I switched from muscle blaze fuel one (which gave me great results on just a single serving per day) to bigmuscles and consumed 2 scoops a day for 25 days with a proper training routine and I made so little progress. It hurts me to see how an Indian company with Bollywood figures advertising them, are cheating people. What surprises me is that no action has been taken against these frauds. Amazon needs to act up and provide justice to every customer like me that has been cheated by this company. I would highly recommend to spend a little extra and go for proven brands.

name: Krishnov chakravorty
title: Product review!
text: First of all the taste of the protein!So I bought Belgian chocolate flavor 2kgs ,First of all I opened my LetsVeriFy app and was kinda skeptical from the packaging of the product but when I scanned the Barcode and wrote the 5 number pin on the lid it was valid and 100% real ,Then the taste I‚Äôll give it a 7.5 out of 10 it was good there were so lumps in my protein so that was good ,no side effects or indications of diarrhea!But if you are lactose intolerant then I‚Äôd prefer u guys to have the protien with water instead of milk !So overall I‚Äôll give the protein 9/10..Should You buy it?Hell yes!Worth every penny!..Is the product real?Most of them are real but if you are skeptical just scan before u open the product if it‚Äôs not return it!but it always comes real tbh!..Any side effects?Nah..Ignore all the negative reviews all the negative reviews are from ppl who just started bodybuilding and expect quick growth!Been doing bodybuilding from the past 7 years so trust me this protein is worth it!

name: Suryapratap
title: One of the best for intermediates
text: I'm using this product for about 1 year or more. I can say that this brand is working hard to improve there products. When I started using it, it was the most adorable whey protein which also tastes good. Considering the results, if it's pure whey, irrespective of brand it will give you the results. It's a myth that results vary from brands to brands. Actually the quality varies from brand to brand which ultimately impacts results. Anyway, talking about this bigmuscle's whey, the advantages are it's affordable, tastes good, it's a blended Protein and most importantly we will rarely encounter fake or duplicate product. In some case I found the product suspicious, but no worries. I just replaced it easily.For beginners and intermediates, this is the perfect one I can recommend.

name: Shushrut
title: BUY! BUY NOW!! KEEP BUYING THIS!!!
text: By far the best protein drink I've had. It has the perfect flavour, perfect mixability and the perfect combo (since it comes with creatine).I've tried MB, Quista and Sinew, they all have an artificial taste for the chocolate flavour. But this one has the best taste of them all. It tastes very natural and doesn't have a medicinal smell.I needed to buy a shaker for Quista as it used to not mix properly, but you can mix this with a spoon as well. It tastes great and no additional sugar required.The fact that it's so cheap and also comes with creatine is unbelievable. Go for it if you find this anywhere below ‚Çπ1500.

Once my bottle is over, I'm never repurchasing it again. I'd rather go for Endura mass, even though comparatively it has lower protein content, atleast its taste is bearable.

name: Customer
title: It doesn't have a normal texture like other proteins.

name: subhajeet Bhattacharya
title: good whey protein
text: It's a good whey protein..The taste is amazingIt's authentic and it came with a scratch code with which you can verify the authenticity of this whey protein..However the results depend upon how you train and how much protein intake your body gets per day..I took two scoops per day, one scoop along with breakfast, one scoop after workout and sometimes one scoop at night but it's better you take casein at night because it's a slow digesting protein..You need to take the required amount of protein per day for Muscle Protein Synthesis so that your muscles can grow..So don't expect amazing results by just taking one or two scoops of this whey per day..Your diet must also include whole foods with good protein content along with this supplement..Foods like chicken breast, eggs, broccoli, pulses, cheese, yogurt, soya chunks, fish, nuts, peanut butter etc should also be taken along with this whey protein..If you do everything correctly, you will surely see the results like im seeing üî•

name: Ayush Nigam
title: Good Porduct but taste could be better
text: Have been using for a month...ordered 500gm Belgian chocolate to try first..Wish cafe latte or vanilla flavour would available for 500gm. About flavour, it's okish could be better but who cares about taste when you look at product offerings with 0 sugar and 25g of protein for 35g of serving size..thats most important factor. Other brands don't provide that high protein contant per serving size..plus this product gives detailed amino acids content which is very good (which means this brand is not shy providing amino acids profile). Powder is dissolvable with little shake, no glums noticed which is good point. Plus no after affects like digestion problem faced which means quality product. Also manufacture date received was May 21. Overall satisfied with product but taste could be better. Its not aweful but not delicious

name: Shanmugam
title: Great Taste and Convenient Packaging - Good for beginners
text: I got this yesterday. It tastes good and very convenient to use as a post work out protein source. I received a 'small token of love' with the purchase and I really liked that idea; you give us a chance to connect back with you in a positive way and also get your product reviewed - a win win situation. That is actually an aspect of the purchase that I liked.1) The container is huge. You don't have to arrange a bottle or container to fill it; it is already filled in a spacious container. You certainly need more 'shelf space' to hold it. It has a label with complete details of all the amino-acids (protein components) present, with their quantity.2) The scoop is usually buried inside, which automatically happens because of the transport. I suggest the manufacturer to keep the scoop separate and easy enough to find; the little guy was playing hide and seek with me and gave me some trouble.3) The recommended usage is to use 180 ml water with one scoop of powder. But a lot of it sticks to the bottom and doesn't dissolve easily. This is probably the case with whey protein in general. But some tips to make it more homogenous drink is appreciated.To manufacturers: Consider including a small usage guide with the product. It may be a novel idea. Not everyone may be interested in consuming 25 grams of protein supplement in a single serving. A protein isolate is a life-saver. But general population lack the knowledge about the importance of protein for various health goals and the ease of supplementing it with a product like this.

name: Yash

title: Read the review before buying.

The label is rolled over the box like it's done with the hand.It looks nothing like the one in image.That powder inside smells great, tastes great but it's all milk powder enhanced. That protein content is really low.I got this for Rs.1000 with a free creatine. How can anyone produce 1kg of whey protein for just 700.The lab report given by some youtubers such as 20kgdown, Allaboutnutrition found this had only 12g protein scoop i.e., half of what has been claimed. And 18g/scoop in some batches. Many other youtubers found the same but they later removed their video from YouTube when the company paid them to do so.So most of the reviews on youtube are paid by the company.Other options available in same price range such are MB Fuel one or SINEW whey conc. 79I just want other beginners like me to not get cheated and be able to choose the right product for their price. Good luck.

name: Sahlaik Ahmad
title: Worst protein.
text: Guys don't buy it! It doesn't tastes good, moreover not even close to expectations! It's way more costly too however it's garbage. You can buy GNC bolt that is much better than this. It's overhyped and it's terrible seriously trust me you will hate it....I want to return and get refund however Amazon says we are sending someone to pickup however no one came so far after 4 attempts. They will ignore your concern and you will end up loosing your money.

name: abhiman
title: Low protein per scoop, but very good VFM

name: Saad Ahmad Khan
title: Bigmuscles claiming 71% and giving 30-40% protein in relaity
text:
The media could not be loaded.
                



¬†Unfortunately I‚Äôve been using bigmuscle product since last 2-3 months because I ordered a 2kg and 1kg pack together and it was the biggest mistake of my life. Upon mixing the powder with water it forms a lot of froth and almost 3/4th of the powder turns into the froth and then you have to wait for at least 30 mins for froth to settle down. And I was not getting any visible result using this product so i did some research and found that the labdoor has revoked their certification. So i got curious and saw some videos on YouTube where most of the people did the lab test of the protein and found that this powder only provides 30-40%(10-14g per serving of 35gm) of protein on dry basis whereas it claims almost 71% protein on there label. Maybe this is the reason labdoor has revoked there certification. I hope my review helps you to decide whether to buy this product or not.

name: RAHUL LOHIA

name: Shubham
title: Overall It's Value For Money
text: I've been using the product for few months now i haven't seen any significant difference on my muscle size but it definitely gives me more energy when I workout the flavour is average and overall is value for money i know my muscle wouldn't grow miraculously let's hope to get best results after consistent use.

name: Krishnov chakravorty
title: Product review!
text: First of all the taste of the protein!So I bought Belgian chocolate flavor 2kgs ,First of all I opened my LetsVeriFy app and was kinda skeptical from the packaging of the product but when I scanned the Barcode and wrote the 5 number pin on the lid it was valid and 100% real ,Then the taste I‚Äôll give it a 7.5 out of 10 it was good there were so lumps in my protein so that was good ,no side effects or indications of diarrhea!But if you are lactose intolerant then I‚Äôd prefer u guys to have the protien with water instead of milk !So overall I‚Äôll give the protein 9/10..Should You buy it?Hell yes!Worth every penny!..Is the product real?Most of them are real but if you are skeptical just scan before u open the product if it‚Äôs not return it!but it always comes real tbh!..Any side effects?Nah..Ignore all the negative reviews all the negative reviews are from ppl who just started bodybuilding and expect quick growth!Been doing bodybuilding from the past 7 years so trust me this protein is worth it!

name: Suryapratap
title: One of the best for intermediates
text: I'm using this product for about 1 year or more. I can say that this brand is working hard to improve there products. When I started using it, it was the most adorable whey protein which also tastes good. Considering the results, if it's pure whey, irrespective of brand it will give you the results. It's a myth that results vary from brands to brands. Actually the quality varies from brand to brand which ultimately impacts results. Anyway, talking about this bigmuscle's whey, the advantages are it's affordable, tastes good, it's a blended Protein and most importantly we will rarely encounter fake or duplicate product. In some case I found the product suspicious, but no worries. I just replaced it easily.For beginners and intermediates, this is the perfect one I can recommend.

name: Shushrut
title: BUY! BUY NOW!! KEEP BUYING THIS!!!
text: By far the best protein drink I've had. It has the perfect flavour, perfect mixability and the perfect combo (since it comes with creatine).I've tried MB, Quista and Sinew, they all have an artificial taste for the chocolate flavour. But this one has the best taste of them all. It tastes very natural and doesn't have a medicinal smell.I needed to buy a shaker for Quista as it used to not mix properly, but you can mix this with a spoon as well. It tastes great and no additional sugar required.The fact that it's so cheap and also comes with creatine is unbelievable. Go for it if you find this anywhere below ‚Çπ1500.

name: Neetesh sharma
title: I don‚Äôt trust the brand.

There is this pungent chemical smell whenever you open lid of the box. Couple of times i used it and you may call it mere coincidence but stomach some what revolted.  I would stick to reputable brands only going forward.  Not using it anymore.

It contains nothing but milk powder and a little chocolate flavor.

It tastes like a milk powder and even in my test report there was only 16gm protein and look what this stupid company has mentioned 25gm protein everything is fake about this product so don't ever try to buy this product

title: Read carefully

name: Winter Soldier
title: Choco fudge > strawberry
text: Though I personally feel, choco fudge is way better than strawberry flavor , however this is the best supplement for beginners and intermediate fitness enthusiasts.This flavour is Gluten free, but relatively higher cholesterol levels. Initially it tasted more like bubble gum than strawberry but I think my taste receptors aren't that efficient. However comparing this with my previous choco fudge whey, this makes a lot of froth/foam with cold water in the shakes, which settles after few minutes. Anyhow flavor have least priority for myself.  I combine this whey with muscle tech creatine and glutamine, which results in super gains and strength. After this stack is over , I'll definitely go with the GNC amp series whey along with creatine only.Thanks and happy Lifting ‚ù£Ô∏è

title: I really like the Taste and its thickness
text: I bought this product recently, came well packed as expected. i immediately checked the online for this authenticity. it passed the test. So the product delivered is original.Taste is really nice.. chocolate fudge. mixing with water and milk is good too. Here is the interesting thing i want to share. When you take it water it gets absorbed quickly. But when you mix water and milk together it takes really long time to get digested entirely. i did some test like mixing only with water then only with milk then mixing all three, the best results i got from water. So milk is a no go.Overall its a good product and i would recommend it for both beginners and experts. Hope this helps.

Next day someone from Amazon picked it up and I got the refund. So thumbs up to Amazon service and thumbs down to guardian healthcare or whether sells this product of gnc - either useless or fake product

name: Ruptanu P.
title: Not impressive
text: The flavour is definitely on the sweeter side. To comment on the effectiveness of the protein, for me, it had the same results compared to other cheaper brands like Asitis and Musclexp. On the contrary, the protein is heavier to digest, which for me was the biggest issue. Whey is usually something which should be quick and easy to digest. Also, the amount of protein per serving, 24gms per 35gms scoop, is relatively very less as compared to other brands. GNC should definitely work on improving their products as there are far more better alternatives in the market which have better quality and results even at a cheaper price.

title: Good performance but too sweet!
text: I have tried isolate by GNC before and obviously performance wise that is a little better.However, if we go by price per gm protein, pro performance is not a bad choice.The only let down for me is that it's too sweet! I mixed about a quarter of my old flavorless whey and still the sweetness is overpowering! Strangely it wasn't that sweet when I tried it about 6 months back. Maybe they tweaked it a bit to amuse Indian sweettooth like Coke in India.Nonetheless a good supplement whey in branded entry segment by one of the most trusted brand GNC!

name: Vardan Bansal
title: 100% fake whey, contains salt!
text: I‚??ve been a regular user of whey for sometime now. Upon the recommendation of my gym trainer, I thought of trying GNC for the first time, albeit really scared.Got the product delivered on time, opened it, put a scoop of it in water to taste it, turns out all it tasted like was just pure SALT! Yes, you read it correct, whey protein tasted salty. Even the dry powder without water tasted salty.Never buying this product ever again. 100% fake product and not worth the hassle.

name: Anmol Rai
title: It's a good whey protein..
text: It's a good whey protein..The taste is amazing "Chocolate Supreme"..It's authentic and it came with a scratch code with which you can verify the authenticity of this whey protein..However the results depend upon how you train and how much protein intake your body gets per day..I took three scoops per day, one scoop along with breakfast, two scoops with GNC Creatine after workout and sometimes one scoop at night but it's better you take casein at night because it's a slow digesting protein..You need to take the required amount of protein per day for Muscle Protein Synthesis so that your muscles can grow..So don't expect amazing results by just taking one or two scoops of this whey per day..Your diet must also include whole foods with good protein content along with this supplement..Foods like chicken breast, eggs, broccoli, pulses, cheese, yogurt, soya chunks, fish, nuts, peanut butter etc should also be taken along with this whey protein..If you do everything correctly, you will surely see the results..

name: Winter Soldier
title: Choco fudge > strawberry
text: Though I personally feel, choco fudge is way better than strawberry flavor , however this is the best supplement for beginners and intermediate fitness enthusiasts.This flavour is Gluten free, but relatively higher cholesterol levels. Initially it tasted more like bubble gum than strawberry but I think my taste receptors aren't that efficient. However comparing this with my previous choco fudge whey, this makes a lot of froth/foam with cold water in the shakes, which settles after few minutes. Anyhow flavor have least priority for myself.  I combine this whey with muscle tech creatine and glutamine, which results in super gains and strength. After this stack is over , I'll definitely go with the GNC amp series whey along with creatine only.Thanks and happy Lifting ‚ù£Ô∏è

name: Neel Gangrade
title: I really like the Taste and its thickness
text: I bought this product recently, came well packed as expected. i immediately checked the online for this authenticity. it passed the test. So the product delivered is original.Taste is really nice.. chocolate fudge. mixing with water and milk is good too. Here is the interesting thing i want to share. When you take it water it gets absorbed quickly. But when you mix water and milk together it takes really long time to get digested entirely. i did some test like mixing only with water then only with milk then mixing all three, the best results i got from water. So milk is a no go.Overall its a good product and i would recommend it for both beginners and experts. Hope this helps.

Next day someone from Amazon picked it up and I got the refund. So thumbs up to Amazon service and thumbs down to guardian healthcare or whether sells this product of gnc - either useless or fake product

title: Best protein!
text: I've been using GNC protein powder for years in the UK, one of the best out there. In India i find most of the protein powders bein fake or horrible so this is the best protein to try in India. Go for it!!

name: Sammy
title: Perfect for low budget holders
text: GNC is an forgein brand but the manufacturing takes place in india . It taste much better then labrada which is also in same range and manufactured in india . Luckily I recieved an orginal product and you can easily check the autheticity of this product by scratching the code and entering in GNC website to verify .Taste is kinda sweeter but atleast its not bitter so you can drink it easily in water and in milk it taste even better .57 servings for 3.3k is quite good . Best suited for people who want a good protein under 4k.

name: Ruptanu P.
title: Not impressive
text: The flavour is definitely on the sweeter side. To comment on the effectiveness of the protein, for me, it had the same results compared to other cheaper brands like Asitis and Musclexp. On the contrary, the protein is heavier to digest, which for me was the biggest issue. Whey is usually something which should be quick and easy to digest. Also, the amount of protein per serving, 24gms per 35gms scoop, is relatively very less as compared to other brands. GNC should definitely work on improving their products as there are far more better alternatives in the market which have better quality and results even at a cheaper price.

name: Avi Ashu
title: Good whey protein ...highly recommended for 3k budget
text: Packing : well packedProduct : 100% genuine (just got for it )  , been in this fitness gym for the last 3 years and GNC protein is definitely good for lean muscle recovery and gains .Digestion : no digestion problem , no bloating , no acidity ...Taste : sweetness is well balanced and perfect . chocolate fudge is good ,better than vanilla or strawberry.Budget wise : best for the Indian market as compare to muscle blaze and other Indian products . GNC could have provided one shaker with the protein tub ...

name: Anshu Anshu
title: Good Product.
text: I bought the vanilla flavour, been using it for a month. 1 scoop a day post workout.Pros:-Genuine product, I verified it via both Amazon's Transperency app & GNC webite.Tastes great, at beginning I felt it was a bit to sweet but then you'll get used to it.No bad aftertaste in your mouth.Digests quickly.Noticable difference in post workout recovery.Con:-Mixability can be improved, i notice lumps at times even after a proper shake.Overall great experience, will definitely purchase again.

name: Asutosh S.
title: Tastes Terrible and Synthetic
text: I have been a consumer of this protein for many years and used to love it. Earlier they would import this from the US and now they manufacture it in India. I am shocked how a company like GNC hasn't been able to maintain product consistency in their product. The Indian made product tastes very synthetic and nothing like the original thing. For a while, I didn't even know I had bought the original thing or not. But GNC confirmed it is. So I dunno if I will continue with this or just switch to a protein that doesn't taste this plastic. I am sure there are some compromises made to make the price affordable. Wouldn't recommend if you believe in quality.

title: Poor Quality
text: I bought GNC Pro Performance 100% Whey Protein - 2 kg (Chocolate Supreme) on 3-Aug-2021  which was sold by the vendor Cloudtail India on Amazon. The Guardian Authentication Code is UBBPY5GP. It came in proper packaging, the top was sealed, I scratched the code and it looked authentic except for one major issue that it is "too sweet to drink".I have bought this product 3 times now, really liked the first two times, and never experienced such a sweet protein powder before. It tastes bad with so much sweetness. The issue can be either it is fake or the product quality has got deteriorated. In either case, I'm not buying it again.

Total value for money product.

name: Bharat Singh
title: A brief Review of Beginner Protein.
text: Product is good. However, those having indigestion issues shouldn't buy this. As, it contains artificial sweeteners as well as high quantity of Carbohydrates which don't digest quickly will leave you in lurch and will cause flatuation and bloating all around the day. I would recommend go for high protein content with no artificial sweeteners and low carbs. Any product of muscleblaze shows result with consistent hard work accompanied with good diet and rest(min 6-7 hours a day).I also recommend you to drink water as much as possible at least 4 litres a day while on protein intake. Drink protein powder in water not in milk. Milk contains caesin protein which is useful at night before bed. If Caesin mix whey protein l, it will take a lot of time to digest and again bloating and flatualence.Best time of protein shake- Anabolic State and/or Between the meals.All the best friends!

name: srikara
title: Great for beginners
text: I used this product for a month, this was my first protein supplement, before buying this I was really nervous but now I've seen significant amount of muscle gain and u can see muscle growth in 2 weeks for use real confidence booster for beginner great product by muscle blaze hope beginners will find this helpfulüòâüòâüòÑ

name: Nitin
title: Make a proper Research before buying this
text: Hi All, I am writing this review after using 1 box of this beginner's protein. certainly it will help you with your supplement requirements. BUT you need to research a little not for this product but yourself. just check your skin, if it is acne prone, don't buy it. It causes severe acne breakout. soon after taking this protein, I faced acne breakout on my face and back and on places where i never saw a pimple before. You can study online about this and choose a right brand and not this just because a shaker is free with it. thats what I did. I moved on to Myprotein. Although it is a bit expensive than this but I moved on from this product. I will write a review regarding my protein also after using it for a significant time.

title: Why people make a fuss on this topic Muscle blaze beginners protein and gainer pro
text: I got these today perfect package with original seal tried mix ability is good taste good nothing suspicious on this price point

name: Aditya Saurav
title: Good purchase!
text: Well I started working out few months ago and it was a helluva journey. A cousin of mine who's a fitness freak üòÇ recommended me this. I got it fairly quick even in lockdown thanks to Amazon delivery service. I'd say it fulfilled its purpose. Since its a beginner product, it'll give you 12g of protein in one heaping scoop which is fairly enough for a beginner. It'll never miraculously help you in shedding weight as the product never intended to, its main purpose is to provide you protein which can be easily aborbed by your body after your workout session so that your muscles can heal up. Long story short its a good product to kickstart your healthly lifestyle. I've used it and I'm happy with it.

title: Problem with shaker
text: The product is good but the shaker is not air tight and while shaking with liquid (milk or water) inside some drops comes out of the edges of the side cap and the top sipper is air tight, no problem with the sipper part. Please modify the cap as airtight. btw the quality of plastic used in the shaker is awesome though. Thanks.

name: MOSES MARK RAI
title: Good
text: So why is this protein very cheap as compared to other protein powders here is your answer yes the protein is cheap as it has lesser amount of protein % per scoop which is about 12g and plus 12g for carbohydrates as well comes with it other when protein has higher prices as they come with whipping amount of 26-30g of protein with 3.1g of carbohydrates...Now should we buy it is it worth it yes it is two scoops can give you 24g of protein and 24g of carbohydrates now now before you think isnt carbohydrates also there yes ut is but you can later reduce the carbohydrate intake from your diet to balance the calories.Now for the mixing it mixes well but only one scoop in 200ml water it doesn't have that heavy texture but 2 scoop will give you the perfect texturePricing yes 998 33servings it's a good dealLastly you cant label a protein powder good or bad just because you used it once at least 5-6 months you gotta use it in order to see the difference . And Getting a Good physique just doesnt come by consuming heavy expensive whey protein it takes time heavy lifting balanced diet and along with protein powder combination of all these can lead you to your fitness goal .I hope my review helps you in your fitness journey good luck

name: Bisheswar Karmakar
title: Packs a punch
text: This is the absolute best product you can find in this category. Perfect for muscle growth and keeping carbs and fat to a bare minimum. The protein content is almost double compared to other products, and what matters even more is the carb content which is extremely low.I'd say a 8/10 product, 2 points off for its poor solubility in both water and milk. Forms clumps and then I'd have to chomp on it separately.

text: First think this is not Muscle builder,fat loss product, weight gainer. This is only protein and this protein is good for beginners. Let's talk about flavor flavour is pawder chocolate i tried it with water and also milk in water i don't like it but when I try with milk this iss too good like chocolate milk shake i drink it daily. This protein 1 kg upto 50 to 60 days I takr 1 scoop daily with milk. I forgot about shaker so shakers material quality is good in shaker mixer the protein properly mix with milk or water

name: Dillen
title: Good, but not good:)
text: It is all good, but better start consuming whey protein from start itself. If you read the protein content of this product, it us just 12 gms per serving, which quite less. Instead of this better go for Whey protein performance or Whey protein energy. And always go for flavour ones, because the unflavored ones are not easy to consume, you'll feel like you're on medication. So go for a product that is high in protein content, and which is flavoured. Thanks!

name: DDas
title: I liked d product
text: Good product and received well packed from Amazon. I liked d product helps to boost strength spclly when u r tired from heavy workout. Tastes very good chocolatey. Thick and rich taste in milk or warm water. I consume once a day only after work out..so 5 days a week. It's my 1st experience with protein powder.

name: Prakash Pathak
title: Don't buy received only half kg product tampered from bottom.
text: Received tampered product , looks like someone has taken almost 300-400 grams of powder from bottom.I checked the code it was authentic product from muscle blaze but the jar was tempered from bottom. When I open the jar it was only half fill. I thought that would be the quantity as I was buying for the first time but yesterday when I refill the jar with asitis whey I realised that someone has taken around 30-400 grams out and repack the jar from bottom.Even it was purchased from the reputed seller it's a altered.Amazon should look into these kind of issue. 1st time users can be cheated easily by sellers.

name: Mohammed Haisham Harees
title: Absolutely recommend it
text: At first, I was a bit skeptical about buying this protein powder because of a lot claims from people who have used it here in the review section. I saw people complaining about how they developed certain skin problems and allergies. But I decided to buy it anyways and try it for myself and I am glad that I did.I gained close to 4kg last time I checked my weight. I am seeing a noticeable difference in my muscle growth. And no, I didn't experience any sort of side effects or whatever. But you have to know that, protein powder can cause certain side effects to some people (I have read MB's blog). But the only way to know it is by trying it for yourself.The flavour is rich and it tastes sort of creamy. Gonna order another bottles soon. Totally recommended. üòä

name: Madhavendra Singh
title: Received damaged container
text: The seal was broken and had a hole in it and the taste was unusual prolly spoiled or contaminated had to throw it away. It was my first time buying supplements online and even when many people asked me to not buy it online even my fitness trainer even then I did, but Thanks to Amazon I received a full refund but it was still a disappointment to receive damage product after waiting for 5 days after placing the orderSo I'd recommend buy these things offline if you want to maintain a strict workout regime without any disturbance in day to day schedule a few hundred bucks are still worth to spend if you want your body to stay fit.But I've used this product earlier for like a year now so I'd say it's good for beginners just maintain a strict diet and buy it offline to reduce unwanted stress Amazon isn't a good choice for buying consumable or edible goods I'm saying this from past experiences too.

name: Manish
title: Contains Maltodextrin, Protein content is very less per scoop
text: Pros1. The flavor is good.2. The packaging is good.3. Mixability is good.4. It is okay for a price of Rs. 999.5. Funnily, it is enough sweet that you can use it as a substitute for adding sugar (if you have a habit of eating sugary food) because of its ingredients.Cons1. It contains Maltodextrin which has a very high GI, google and you would understand more, it is not a recommended ingredient if you have diabetes.2. The protein quantity per scoop is very less, so it might not be recommended if you have a little more experience or even for fast muscle recovery.3. Not recommended if you need insulin spike in your body.4. Not recommended for intermediate gym people.My verdict - It was good for a start but I am not gonna buy it again.If you really want Muscleblaze protein, go with MB Fuel one+.For students like me- If it is cheap, it doesn't mean it will be as effective, add 200 more and you can get unflavoured whey protein of MB which has higher protein content.

name: Preeti
title: Go for beginners

name: Akshay S.
title: Ideal for Beginners
text: Beginners WheyPros1. Price : You can‚Äôt complain on this, don‚Äôt even try.2. Solubility is good, decent I‚Äôd say. Mix it with water/milk and grind for a smooth shake.3. Storage : Comes in an airtight jar4. Validity : You could easily check through the code given over the lid.5. Would easily last a month for 1 heap full scoop per day, depending on the usage.6. Taste : Everyone relates to this word ‚ÄúChocolate‚Äù. Not bad at all.7. Certainly the best option out there for beginners and those seeking a budget friendly deal.8. Ideal Protein Content : Around 12 gms of protein is the safest bait for any beginner. Not more, no less.Cons1. Could cause digestion problems to lactose intolerant individuals and those with any history of stomach issues.2. If you‚Äôre not working out regularly, bloating is a possibility.3. A bit on the sweeter side. I like sweet, you may not though. Try adding more water or milk as per your taste.Note : Add water first and then the powder for ideal mixing and to avoid lumps.

name: Vyshakh Unnikrishnan
title: Prognosis: DO NOT BUY! only 40%Whey and 60% Maltodextrin (Deceptive product description)
text: The product description does not exactly show how much whey extract is present in terms of percentage or grams. It says 12g per serving. If you calculate 30g of the substance for one serving then 12/30 is only 40 percentage whey. There are other products that exactly specify this, for a good one is around 84% or 84g per 100g. There are similar priced ones that has upto 80%. This means that the other 40 percent consists of maltodextrin which is like a filler substance that does not have any nutritional value. Do not buy.

title: I bought it for my daily protein requirement
text: Well I am not into hardcore gymming stuff, I bought this to full fill my daily protein requirement  as everyone knows how's the hostels/pg have food quality.This time I tried protine powder from the muscle blaze before this I used to consume protinex which was much more costing than this, so bought cookie and cream flavour and I was surprised that it actually tasted like cookie and cream.I consume this with milk not with water as you know I am not into muscle building just some cardio stuff, so I don't need that instant protine intake.Can't comment on the sugar thing, as it has been mentioned on the nutritional value stricker that zero sugar but it always tasted sweet. May that flavour thing made it taste sweet.Overall it's a nice product, you guys can give it a try.After this, I am gonna try one of among mango or chocolate.

title: Genuineness 100 percent
text: I brought this product trusting the genuineness of the brand. I read a lot of reviews claiming the protein content was low, it was specifically written that this supplement was for beginners. Muscleblaze has other supplements having higher protein content too. The delivery, product and service was exemplary and followed to the word specified. Highly recommended for beginners

name: Lokesh Surana
title: Perfect product for beginners
text: Read the description in the product. Initial you use half the scoop for first five days, then one scoop per day and slowly increasing it to two scoop per day.They also have codes to identify whether your product is authentic or not.

name: Tamal Roy
title: Value for money
text: Perfect for beginners, you can have this with milk or water, while doing your workout. This is perfectly value for money, and really gives you energy while working out. Flavour is really good, and the packaging is awesome. You also get a spoon with the big container which keeps the whey safe.You should remember that this is whey protein, so don't have this before workout.One spoon a day is enough, and at the beginning, half spoon is enough.In short, it is highly recommended for beginners. The protein quantity is 40% which is Perfect for beginners, but if you are a pro, go for whey raw protein of the same company MuscleBlaze

name: Pritam
title: Totally satisfying Supplement
text: If you want to get some good muscle mass. Then try this. Super delicious. If you have never tried whey protein they try this beginner's protein because this contains protein as much as carbohydrates! Which will give you optimum performances! No side effects. (Unless you have problens with lactic products)!DON'T GO FOR OTHER WHEY PROTEIN WHICH HAS 24G+ OF PROTEIN IN 32G OF SERVING IF YOU ARE TRYING THIS FOR THE FIRST TIME, BECAUSE YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO DIGEST THOSE IN FIRST TRY. SO BETTER TRY THIS FIRST

name: Arijit
title: Nice buy
text: Decent taste. Certainly original as I have verified it through their sms service. Only downside is mixing is really tough. I use a mixer and it still doesn't mix properly! Also doesn't mix well in hot milk. Never tried mixing using a shaker though. Also, I did a lot of calculations. This supplement offers one of the best protein/rupee ratio, much better than muscleblaze gold or massgainer pro and the likes. Of course, there is a limit to serving size so you can get only 12 g of protein at once. What I'm trying to say here is that it's cost-effective and bang for your buck

title: Good protein for regular use and gym beginners

title: It's a SCAM

Bottom seal is broken in most of the packs and item isn't returnable too. That's sad3. At same price go for some protein which has 20-24 g of protein per scoop and low carbohydratesVERY BAD DEAL IN ALL

name: Bharat Singh
title: A brief Review of Beginner Protein.
text: Product is good. However, those having indigestion issues shouldn't buy this. As, it contains artificial sweeteners as well as high quantity of Carbohydrates which don't digest quickly will leave you in lurch and will cause flatuation and bloating all around the day. I would recommend go for high protein content with no artificial sweeteners and low carbs. Any product of muscleblaze shows result with consistent hard work accompanied with good diet and rest(min 6-7 hours a day).I also recommend you to drink water as much as possible at least 4 litres a day while on protein intake. Drink protein powder in water not in milk. Milk contains caesin protein which is useful at night before bed. If Caesin mix whey protein l, it will take a lot of time to digest and again bloating and flatualence.Best time of protein shake- Anabolic State and/or Between the meals.All the best friends!

name: srikara
title: Great for beginners
text: I used this product for a month, this was my first protein supplement, before buying this I was really nervous but now I've seen significant amount of muscle gain and u can see muscle growth in 2 weeks for use real confidence booster for beginner great product by muscle blaze hope beginners will find this helpfulüòâüòâüòÑ

name: Nitin
title: Make a proper Research before buying this
text: Hi All, I am writing this review after using 1 box of this beginner's protein. certainly it will help you with your supplement requirements. BUT you need to research a little not for this product but yourself. just check your skin, if it is acne prone, don't buy it. It causes severe acne breakout. soon after taking this protein, I faced acne breakout on my face and back and on places where i never saw a pimple before. You can study online about this and choose a right brand and not this just because a shaker is free with it. thats what I did. I moved on to Myprotein. Although it is a bit expensive than this but I moved on from this product. I will write a review regarding my protein also after using it for a significant time.

name: Salami
title: Useless pouch
text: They've changed giving it from the box to the pouch, first every time its cumbersome to open and close the zip lock of this pouch.  And the second worst thing is the whole powder comes up flying in air once you open them due to pressure release as this is dry powder.  I don't understand how come a company could ruin a product for a customer just by spoiling the convenience of using it. Very disappointed and pathetic.

name: Bisheswar Karmakar
title: Packs a punch
text: This is the absolute best product you can find in this category. Perfect for muscle growth and keeping carbs and fat to a bare minimum. The protein content is almost double compared to other products, and what matters even more is the carb content which is extremely low.I'd say a 8/10 product, 2 points off for its poor solubility in both water and milk. Forms clumps and then I'd have to chomp on it separately.

name: Shahjad Khan
title: Good one for beginners
text: Not a nice product overallBut it‚Äôs a suitable product for the beginners.

name: Dhiraj Karne
title: Flavor is good and best for beginners who don't know what is protein and why take it so go for it
text: First think this is not Muscle builder,fat loss product, weight gainer. This is only protein and this protein is good for beginners. Let's talk about flavor flavour is pawder chocolate i tried it with water and also milk in water i don't like it but when I try with milk this iss too good like chocolate milk shake i drink it daily. This protein 1 kg upto 50 to 60 days I takr 1 scoop daily with milk. I forgot about shaker so shakers material quality is good in shaker mixer the protein properly mix with milk or water

name: Dillen
title: Good, but not good:)
text: It is all good, but better start consuming whey protein from start itself. If you read the protein content of this product, it us just 12 gms per serving, which quite less. Instead of this better go for Whey protein performance or Whey protein energy. And always go for flavour ones, because the unflavored ones are not easy to consume, you'll feel like you're on medication. So go for a product that is high in protein content, and which is flavoured. Thanks!

name: DDas
title: I liked d product
text: Good product and received well packed from Amazon. I liked d product helps to boost strength spclly when u r tired from heavy workout. Tastes very good chocolatey. Thick and rich taste in milk or warm water. I consume once a day only after work out..so 5 days a week. It's my 1st experience with protein powder.

name: Prakash Pathak
title: Don't buy received only half kg product tampered from bottom.
text: Received tampered product , looks like someone has taken almost 300-400 grams of powder from bottom.I checked the code it was authentic product from muscle blaze but the jar was tempered from bottom. When I open the jar it was only half fill. I thought that would be the quantity as I was buying for the first time but yesterday when I refill the jar with asitis whey I realised that someone has taken around 30-400 grams out and repack the jar from bottom.Even it was purchased from the reputed seller it's a altered.Amazon should look into these kind of issue. 1st time users can be cheated easily by sellers.

name: Mohammed Haisham Harees
title: Absolutely recommend it
text: At first, I was a bit skeptical about buying this protein powder because of a lot claims from people who have used it here in the review section. I saw people complaining about how they developed certain skin problems and allergies. But I decided to buy it anyways and try it for myself and I am glad that I did.I gained close to 4kg last time I checked my weight. I am seeing a noticeable difference in my muscle growth. And no, I didn't experience any sort of side effects or whatever. But you have to know that, protein powder can cause certain side effects to some people (I have read MB's blog). But the only way to know it is by trying it for yourself.The flavour is rich and it tastes sort of creamy. Gonna order another bottles soon. Totally recommended. üòä

name: Madhavendra Singh
title: Received damaged container
text: The seal was broken and had a hole in it and the taste was unusual prolly spoiled or contaminated had to throw it away. It was my first time buying supplements online and even when many people asked me to not buy it online even my fitness trainer even then I did, but Thanks to Amazon I received a full refund but it was still a disappointment to receive damage product after waiting for 5 days after placing the orderSo I'd recommend buy these things offline if you want to maintain a strict workout regime without any disturbance in day to day schedule a few hundred bucks are still worth to spend if you want your body to stay fit.But I've used this product earlier for like a year now so I'd say it's good for beginners just maintain a strict diet and buy it offline to reduce unwanted stress Amazon isn't a good choice for buying consumable or edible goods I'm saying this from past experiences too.

name: Ashok
title: Disappointed.
text: I got these product and I checked it was authentic but it was becoming soapy when I diluted it..I don't know what the hell I got .Although delivery was fastüòÇüòÇ

text: Received a defect quality product from Amazon. Its stinking and unconsumed one. I have informed both amazon and muscle blaze about it. And the irony is that no one is showing zeal to take the  responsibility of there fault product. Poor service shown by amazon to its prime and certified buyer.

name: Manish
title: Contains Maltodextrin, Protein content is very less per scoop
text: Pros1. The flavor is good.2. The packaging is good.3. Mixability is good.4. It is okay for a price of Rs. 999.5. Funnily, it is enough sweet that you can use it as a substitute for adding sugar (if you have a habit of eating sugary food) because of its ingredients.Cons1. It contains Maltodextrin which has a very high GI, google and you would understand more, it is not a recommended ingredient if you have diabetes.2. The protein quantity per scoop is very less, so it might not be recommended if you have a little more experience or even for fast muscle recovery.3. Not recommended if you need insulin spike in your body.4. Not recommended for intermediate gym people.My verdict - It was good for a start but I am not gonna buy it again.If you really want Muscleblaze protein, go with MB Fuel one+.For students like me- If it is cheap, it doesn't mean it will be as effective, add 200 more and you can get unflavoured whey protein of MB which has higher protein content.

Could cause digestion problems to lactose intolerant individuals and those with any history of stomach issues.2. If you‚Äôre not working out regularly, bloating is a possibility.3. name: Vyshakh Unnikrishnan
title: Prognosis: DO NOT BUY! only 40%Whey and 60% Maltodextrin (Deceptive product description)
text: The product description does not exactly show how much whey extract is present in terms of percentage or grams. It says 12g per serving. If you calculate 30g of the substance for one serving then 12/30 is only 40 percentage whey. There are other products that exactly specify this, for a good one is around 84% or 84g per 100g. There are similar priced ones that has upto 80%. This means that the other 40 percent consists of maltodextrin which is like a filler substance that does not have any nutritional value. Do not buy.

name: Ron Baruah
title: Great entry level protein suppliment
text: This product was my entry into the world of protein supplements and by far it has exceeded my expectations. This is made of whey concentrate which compared to the other forms like whey isolate has 80% protein only, but bear in mind unless you are a gym freak 80% protein is sufficient for you as this won't be the only meal you'll have all day. It has a mild sweet taste, which I personally prefer more than a strong sweetness. And if you are wondering about the taste, the chocolate flavour is pretty decent too and you can easily convince yourself it is a chocolate milkshake. It has the essential amino acids and BCAA with nothing that can be harmful for you. Although it is optimized for use with milk I recommend using it with water as whey is already a part of milk and adding milk makes it a thick and a bit slimy, also you can keep the nutritional value from the liquid part of the shake zero with water.The major down point being the amount of carbohydrates in it. Ideally in order to lose weight and make lean muscles carbohydrates should be avoided, unfortunately this should be termed a carb shake with 12 grams of protein but 12.5 grams of carbs per 30g serving.Inside the packet there is a verification code to see if the product is genuine and also a 30g scoop within the powder.On a budget, this is a decent product but not a value for money.

Thankfully it was a holiday, cause that entire day I went 4 times to toilet, suffering from loose motions out of nowhere. All this experience, I don't know who else I can point fingers to. I think I am switching back to Healthkart supplements.

name: Shraboni Sinha
title: Very good quality protein.
text: Whey protein is commonly used for improving athletic performance and increasing strength, but evidence to support these uses is mixed. Whey protein is also used to reverse weight loss in people with HIV and to help prevent allergic conditions in infants. Whey protein is a source of protein that might improve the nutrient content of the diet. Whey protein might also have effects on the immune system.This is a very high-quality Beginners WHEY protein. Beginners whey protein means it does not have a high amount of protein, which really good for beginners. Actually, protein consumption depends on your body habit, so if you are not habituated then there may be a problem occur to digest the whey protein. I joined the gym two months ago. That's why I brought this protein. It helps me to maintain the protein balance of my body. I just love its double chocolate flavor.--This Whey Protein is Gluten Free.--This Whey Protein Banned Substance Free.--There is a 33gm Scoop inside the container also.--It is fast-acting whey protein. Imported from the USA.--It is ultra-filtered Whey for less cholesterol, fat & sodium.--It contains Digestive Enzymes for faster absorption.--It can be mix easily using glass and spoon.--It is manufactured in an ISO certified company.--It provides 12gm Protein, 12.5gm carbohydrate, 0.95gm Fat, and 104KCAL in per scoop serving.It has 90% Isolated Whey Protein, Cocoa bean extract, Sodium Chloride, Xanthum gum (INS 415).  The presence of these ingredients is really a good sign of a good quality protein powder. It provides energy and enhanced body performance. It helps to recover fastly from tiredness also.It also has Digestive Enzymes like- Lactase, Papain & Bromelain. These Digestive Enzymes help to digest this protein very fast.This whey protein is instantized. That means if there is no shaker cup or any blender, just add one rounded scoop of this Whey protein to a glass filled with 6-7oz (200 ml approx) of water, low-fat milk, or any favorite beverage. Then mix it up with a spoon, stir it until the powder is completely dissolved.This Whey Protein can be used for more than just protein shakes. By adding fresh or frozen fruits, peanut butter, flaxseed oil, coconut, and other high-energy ingredients, can transform the shake into a delicious high-protein meal.It also can be consumed by mixing a scoop of it with oatmeal, yogurt.Take 1-2 servings a day or as suggested by the dietician. I take this Whey protein twice a day. I take it with water at the time of breakfast and in the evening after the Gym.--Please use this before 18months of manufacture.--Net Weight is 1KG.

title: Found INSECT and PLASTIC material inside the protein Jar
text: [ Buyers Read this review carefully ]When I purchased this I never thought such a disgusting incident can happen to me.After few weeks of usage when I serving my scoop I suddenly look into my jar and I saw something black and light brown substance.when I investigate it. Then I email my issue and call again next day.MB customer consultant disconnect my call they are saying this is my fault ( Saying why this happened after long time ).( Where you kept the protein jar )( Why this happened in the bottom of jar if there is insect it comes just after opening )and some more silly replyTrust me they are not even apologize for their mistake.I am really disappointed from this.I will never gonna use MUSCLEBLAZE product I swear.I hope all the buyers think many times before using this cheap brand.

name: Vishwas L.
title: Good product 100% that set
text: Generally for protein shakes, it's better to go with flavours that go well with milk. You can choose flavours like grape, strawberry and mango just for a change.But the problem is the flavour is too sweet and I felt like mango sugar taste and for slow absorption if you take it with milk then you have to consume within 5-7 mins as the milk breaks. Rest I find it good but I feel its contains some sugars (not mentioned on the container) as it's so sweet. In my opinion it's better to go with caffe mocca or chocolate if you don't mind the taste but if you want to try something new go for this. Btw it tastes so good with milk and when mixed with water it tastes like diluted copy products of maaza or fruity.

name: Khagendra
title: Read It
text: Brand is famous and doesn't need any review however it is bit costly because of it's popularity.Take it but with safety.1. Never take more than necessary protein because excess protein can damage kidney. Yes we believe if we take extra, we will be stronger however it has side effects and shoud be consumed in safe limit.2. When you take protein you must drink minimum 3 litres of water. Again drinking excess water helps kidney to flush out excess urea and also excess unconsumed protein.3. When you don't excercise, don't take it. Many guys keep consuming it even after they don't go to gym or workout. Don't take it as a health nutrition.4. When you visit any gym, the gym trainer try to brainwash you to buy protein powder. Never listen to the gym guy because he gets commision to sell protein powder. If you really need, get one. Also don't buy the brand suggested by gym trainer. To get high commission they suggest you any other brand and they don't care about your health. They just care about their commision.Thanks for reading. Cheers!

name: Shrinivas
title: Authentic and Best Product
text: The product I received is Authentic and Tastes so good.Many People are confused on how to check the Authenticity of this product and that's why I'm writing this review to help you out. Following are the things you need to check and that determines the authenticity.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------1. The Seal. ON has it's black seal with golden ON hologram on it. It's the part of plastic and isn't any sticker.2. The Spelling mistake. ISOLATE & ISOLATES both are AUTHENTIC. ISOLATE is from USA & ISOLATES is from UK.3. The Bright Commodities Sticker and Scratch code which you can check by visiting their website.4. The BOX doesn't come with INNER SEAL. If you don't find SEAL INSIDE THEN IT IS AUTHENTIC.5. The INSIDE of the CAP. It has MADE IN USA written on it.6. The ON LOGO on the SCOOP. If the SCOOP HAS ON LOGO then it's AUTHENTIC.7. The MFD on the tub which will be TWO YEARS DIFFERENCE and WHEN SCRATCHED, IT GOES.8. The MIXABILITY of the powder, IT WILL GET MIXED VERY EASILY IN 30 SECONDS.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------IF you get all the above things right then your product is AUTHENTIC.The product is really good and i could see the RESULTS FROM DAY ONE itself and it TASTES GOOD but the taste stays in your mouth for a while. I just use a glass and a spoon to mix and it MIXES IN 30 SECONDS leaving NO LUMPS.It FEELS LIGHT and DOESN'T BLOAT. MUSCLE RECOVERY is really quick.If you are LACTOSE INTOLERANT then YOU SHOULD BUY IT because IT DOESN'T HARM YOU.MUSCLE BLAZE WHEY GAVE ME PIMPLES BUY ON WHEY DIDN'T GIVE ME ANY PIMPLES.Go for it and you won't regret.Happy Lifting

name: akshay kumar
title: Genuine product
text: Brought this product through the seller cloudtail. I checked through few ways and found it to be a genuine product.How to identify:1. Check if there is a hologram (golden colour) at the cap2. Look for the manufacturing details and batch code at the bottom of the bottle . It should be in blue colour . The manufacturing date should be of a difference of 2 years exactly .3. Check for any spelling mistakes4. Scan the QR code and make sure it leads to their original site .5. Inside the bottle , there will be a scoop and it should be in golden colour with the ON logo .6. The powder should be very light like a talcum powder .Hope this gives you a better idea to check whether it?? genuine .Thank you cloudtail for delivering it in one day and I hope this whey protein gives me a good result .

name: sandeep
title: Genuine product
text: I bought it from cloudtail india and its a genuine product. I have used it twice and it is good for fulfilling the protein content required by your body. I will recommend to those who are doing workout, gyming or exercises and require high protein content for muscle building. If you can complete your required protein content by food like eggs, chicken breasts, etc then there is no need of this protein powder. Therefore don?? buy it blindly, firstly do analyse your body protein needs, workout goals and daily protein intake you are getting currently then go for it. No issues with the product and the brand as it is 100% genuine of Optimum Nutrition.

name: Anurag
title: Good Quality Whey Protein
text: I purchased this product multiple times. Tast is ok for me. I check the authenticity code and packing after doing all the outer inspection its time to check the inside stuff. As we all know pure protein is not heat soluble so I would take some water in a cup put 1 to 2 teaspoon of the whey protein powder mix it and put it in the microwave for 2 mins. After two mins you will find the powder has turned into solid in indian language it will be like (fata hua dudh). We are set and ready to use the product tension free and focus on working out and putting extra effort.

name: Antra Maurya
title: Changes in Authenticity check
text: So I watched a lot of YouTube videos regarding ON authenticity.My product did not have an importer tag also there was no blue expiry date on the bottom.So I called ON customer support and the agent mentioned below points-1. Glanbia (importer) now imports raw material from US and packaging is done in India. I guess the plant is in Himachal and established some 6 months back.2. There will be no importer tag in new ON boxes.3. Expiry date and batch number is now printed on back of the box in a white space with black ink and not on the bottom.4.No vaccum cover on the lid intead a pasted seal.5. Check authenticity by the TRU SEAL (which we all do).
